values: I'm learning how to play keyboard. I'm hoping that within the year, I'll be good enough to do a little something with this new skill on stage. I just figured out what accidentals are all about. Go me.

My new band, Mad at My Desk, is going to be sharing the stage with my best friend's band, Suns Collide, at Sky City in downtown Augusta, GA. It's the CD release party for Suns Collide and man, are they going to be tired because 3/4 of their band is in my band, too!

 It's all happening on March 27th. I need to get busy!
2010. Bring it. I'm ready for everything you plan to throw my way.
I lost my groove, folks. Can someone help me find it?

I'm back! Writing. Sharing. Thinking. Living. Breathing. And, of course, nerdy.

I will post something here at last once each week, but I hope to do so more often than that.

And hey, Dear Reader, I've missed you as much as I've missed myself.

More soon.

Love,
Stephen
